# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This repository contains the conversion of the AD&D Birthright campaign setting for the Genesys RPG system. The project reimagines divine bloodlines, domain rulership, and political intrigue using Genesys' narrative dice system.

## Repository Structure
- `/docs` - Markdown rulebooks and conversion documents
- `/assets` - Images, tables, and other supporting materials
- `/tools` - Scripts and utilities for content generation or conversion
- `/.github` - GitHub configuration and workflows

## Content Guidelines
- Write all rules and lore in Markdown format for modularity
- Maintain consistency with Genesys RPG mechanics
- Preserve the core themes of the Birthright setting
- Structure documents for future PDF publication

## Contribution Standards
- Use clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep Markdown files well-formatted and readable
- Place all documentation in the `/docs` folder
- Store visual assets and tables in the `/assets` folder
